Class ComboBoxUsingEditorDetailer

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class ComboBoxUsingEditorDetailer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MazeObjectEditorDetailer

An abstract class that provides subclasses with a helper function for making useful JComboBoxes.

Nested Class Summary

Method Summary
<S> javax.swing.JComboBox
createComboBox(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,S> entryMap, S startOption, ComboBoxUsingEditorDetailer.MethodHolder<S> methodHolder)
          Creates a JComboBox containing the keys of the entryMap as options, that starts with the String selected that maps to the startOption object, and that passes references to Objects mapped to from the selected String to the given MethodHolder.

Creates a JComboBox containing the keys of the entryMap as options, that starts with the String selected that maps to the startOption object, and that passes references to Objects mapped to from the selected String to the given MethodHolder.
